reference: Dasgupta, P. and J. Stiglitz, (1980) Industrial Structure and the Nature of Innovative Activity, Economic Journal, 90, p. 266-293.

Lee, T. and Wilde, L. (1980), Market Structure and Innovation: A Reformulation, Quarterly Journal of Economics, 94, pp. 429-436.
Lucas, R. (1971), Optimal Management of a Research and Development Project, Management Science, 17, p. 679-697.
